Translations.Text: Ssemlilet ed wid idensen, tilawin nnsen, akked wayen aabden
war OOebbi. Nehoet pen s abrid n wu$ud. ¨¨
Eiifet pen, ih, nitni fellasen asteqsi. E
Ay$eo ur teppemsellakem
Xaii! Assa, nitni ad fken mayna
Ad zzin kra degsen, ar wiyav, pmesteqsayen
Ad inin: "ni$ kunwi teppasem d $uone$, s tgallit
A d inin: "xaii, ur tellim d lmumnin
Ur nesai kra udabu, fellawen. Xaii, tellam d agdud ijuoen
Iuao fella$ wawal n Mass nne$, aql a$, ih, la nessisin
Nes$eoq ikwen; nella, nekwni, d i$eooaqen
Ih, assen, nitni, deg uaaqeb ad dduklen
Akka, s tidep, ay Nxeddem i ibe$wviyen
Ih, nitni, mara asen inin: "ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi", ssem$waoen iman nnsen
Qqaoen: "day a neoo ioebbiten nne$, ilmend umedyaz aoehbani
Xaii, iusa d s tidep, itebbet ed imazanen
Kunwi, war ccekk, a pjeooben aaaqeb aqeoean
A ppeppuqeiiim kan, af wayen txeddmem
kkes ed imdanen n Oebbi izedganen
I widak, l$it ipwassnen
lfakya; u nitni ad ppuauzzen
di leonanat isaadiyen
Mqabalen $ef imieoeen
Ad asen tezzin s lkas n waman ipfeggiven
D imellalen, d ieidanen i wid itessen
Ur qeooeen, ur helken
£uosen, sut wallen ibran
nitenti, am tmelli iffren
Ad zzin, kra $eo kra, pmesteqsayen
Yiwen id ihedoen, segsen, inna d: "illa $uoi umeddakwel
iyi d iqqaoen: "ma, d uuee, kecc, seg wid issawalen tidep
Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, akked i$san, day mazal fella$ iilaba
Inna: "kunwi ma la tepmuqulem
Imuqel, iwala t di pnaufa n wu$ud
Inna d: "s Oebbi, ar qoib iyi tessoueev
Lemmer macci d tacvai n Mass iw, yili aql i seg wid id irsen
Day ur nepmeppat ara
Tameppant nne$ kan tamezwarut, nekwni ur neppuaaqab
Ayagi, s tidep, d arraz ameqwoaean
I wayen icban aya, aanut a wid iaannun
D wagi ay d axxam igerzen, ne$ d ttejoa n Zaqqum
Nerra p, ih, d ahewwel i imednas
Neppat, ih, d ttejoa id iff$en si pnaufa n tmes
Ppemoa s, amzun d iqweooa n ccwaien
Nitni, war ccekk, ad ccen segs, ad ccaoen, segs, iaabbav
Sinna, deffir es ad xelven aman ippayzagen
Sinna, war ccekk, ad u$alen ar wu$ud
Ih, ufan d ibabaten nnsen d im$eooqen
D$a nitni, di lateo nnsen, ddehmen
Ni$ nnetlafen, uqbel nnsen, tegwti seg imezwura
Irna Nuzen asen ed ineddaoen
Muqel amek tevoa d wid ipwanedoen
kkes ed imdanen n Oebbi izedganen
